text: Israel Meir Kirzner (also Yisroel Mayer Kirzner ; born February 13, 1930) is a British-born American economist, historian and rabbi. His economic thought is Austrian School. Kirzner is emeritus professor of economics at New York University and writes about Ludwig von Mises's thinking and methodology in economics. Kirzner's research on entrepreneurship economics is very well known. ==References== ==Other websites== * Israel Kirzner's Faculty Page * First volume of Israel M.
